name: Unexplored
description: The ROGUELITE that feels like a ROGUELIKE. Praised for its fantastically generated dungeons, real-time combat and surprising amount of content and depth. One of the BEST GAMES OF THE YEAR according to PC Gamer and VICE Waypoint.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Graphics Card Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Graphics Card Storage: 500 MB available space
